data.name: Demise of Nations - All Maps & Modding
data.detailed_description:
This DLC unlocks all the maps for Demise of Nations. Maps are added and updated regularly, so instead of adding them to the DLC itself, they are downloaded from within the game. In particular, the DLC give access to the following.

  • All the maps with their scenarios (including player-modded maps).
  • Includes current and upcoming maps that are not released yet. Currently, 170+ maps are available.
  • Can be used in single player or multiplayer games including hotseat games.
  • Allows uploading your map for others to play.
  • No login is required to download the maps from within the game (you need internet still).
  • No DRM: you can play offline (make sure you download the maps beforehand!).

IMPORTANT: if you already purchased "All Maps & Modding" within the game, you do NOT need to buy the DLC also. Both are the same. The game will prevent you from purchasing the DLC from within the game. It's not possible to do so on the DLC web page however. That said, there will a warning in-game if it finds you have it twice telling you to get a refund.

data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Czech*, Japanese*, Korean*, Polish*, Portuguese*, Russian*, Turkish*, Arabic*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*, Ukrainian*, Dutch*, Greek*, Romanian*, Spanish - Latin America*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP or later
  • Processor: 1.8GHz single core
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 256 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.7.3+
  • Processor: 1.8GHz single core
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 256 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux 64bit
  • Processor: 1.8GHz single core
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
